name: Dove Daily Shine Shampoo
description: Enriched with our Nutritive Serum Dove Daily Shine Conditioner smooths over the strand's cuticles leaving soft silky hair with added strength and shine from the very first wash. For hair thats soft smooth and beautiful with every wash Dove Daily Shine Conditioner is an ideal addition to your hair care routine. Nourishment and protection from daily damage wear and tear. Dove shampoo adds shine to normal hair. *Images for illustration purposes only. Product received may vary.
